title: StarTalk Sports Edition Series Premiere – Changing the Game, with Arian Foster
description:
SERIES PREMIERE: Neil deGrasse Tyson sits down with former NFL running back Arian Foster to explore his illustrious NFL career, the rise of science in football, and much more. Co-hosted by Gary O’Reilly and Chuck Nice.

NOTE: StarTalk+ Patrons and All-Access subscribers can listen to this entire episode commercial-free.

Photo Credit: StarTalk.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
